description: The problem is an AsyncIO runtime error when attempting to use numpy in an asynchronous environment. The error occurs when the numpy library is used within an asynchronous function, resulting in an unexpected behavior when the code is executed. The error is caused by the asynchronous function attempting to access the
code:
import numpy as np

# define array of 10 zeros
arr = np.zeros(10)

# define array of 10 ones
arr1 = np.ones(10)

# define array of 10 fives
arr2 = np.full
